notes.author: Dr. Hart (Cardiology)
notes.content:
Discharge Summary.
Principal Diagnosis: Anterior STEMI.
Intervention: DES to LAD.
Echo: LVEF 40%.
Discharge Plan: Home conformtable. Continue Aspirin, Statin, ACEi. Follow up 2 weeks.

ground_truth.explanation: Patient with recent MI and reduced LVEF (40%) should be on a Beta Blocker unless contraindicated.
